question: Which Indian sportsperson recently became the first-ever hockey player to win the 'World Games Athlete of the Year' award?
explanation:
Indian hockey star and the Indian women’s team captain Rani Rampal was recently named as the \'World Games Athlete of the Year\'. She also became the first-ever hockey player worldwide to win the award.
The FIH (International Hockey Federation) has recommended her name for the prestigious award. Rani has topped the 20-day-poll conducted by the World Games with the highest number of votes. She was the player of the tournament in the last year’s FIH Series Finals, in which she led the country to win.
